## Point

Defines a point entry

**Parameters**

-   `db`  

### \_db

**Properties**

-   `_db` **Graph** The graph container instance

### \_properties

**Properties**

-   `_properties` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** List of relations towards other points

### \_related

**Properties**

-   `_related` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** List of related nodes

### \_indexes

**Properties**

-   `_indexes` **[Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array)** List of indexed values

### uuid

**Properties**

-   `uuid` **[Number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** Unique point identifier

### export

Exports the point (for serialisation/caching purpose)

Returns **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 

### import

Imports the point (from a unserialized value previously 
generated with export function)

**Parameters**

-   `data` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** The data to be imported (properties & indexes)

Returns **[Point](#point)** 

### delete

Deletes the point from the graph

### removeAttribute

Just deletes a property (and their links)

**Parameters**

-   `property`  

### removeIndex

Removes an index entry

**Parameters**

-   `name`  

### getIndex

Reads an indexed entry value

**Parameters**

-   `name`  

### index

Attach current node into the specified index

**Parameters**

-   `name`  
-   `value`  

### set

Creates a relation to the specified object

**Parameters**

-   `property`  
-   `object`  

### add

Add a new relation to the specified object

**Parameters**

-   `property`  
-   `object`  

### get

Gets a list of objects

**Parameters**

-   `property`  

### first

Gets the first child of the specified property

**Parameters**

-   `property`
